author: bonz
title: my first lego technic set
review:
a very nice set with working front & back steering.
you could make curves with extremely small turn-radius by only holding the top steering wheel and quickly turning on a flat floor. almost turned around on the spot.

i once broke the torso of the figure vetically right in the middle so that i had to fix it with super-glue. the poor chap can now only look straight ahed.
